snippet.title: World of Glass - Solipsism Reigns Opening Theme (GxB version)
snippet.description:
This is the original opening theme that my partner and I made together for my free visual novel project Solipsism Reigns :3 A dark visual novel with full English voice acting. Travel various worlds with your yandere companion, Kuro.

https://melancholy-marionette.itch.io/solipsism-reigns

The video images and song lyrics are specific to the GxB version of the game. We will alter the song and video for the other versions.

It's not a typical visual novel opening theme video I know xD

World of Glass 
Composed by DRIIMA
https://soundcloud.com/dragonphase 
https://soundcloud.com/driiima
Lyrics by Melancholy Marionette
Performed by DRIIMA & Melancholy Marionette

I made the singing character art using ComiPo! The CG art in the video is in the GxB version of the visual novel and was created by Destini Ruffin.
https://twitter.com/DestiniDraws
https://www.deviantart.com/destiniuchiha https://www.deviantart.com/destinidraws
